sentence.Network_en: Mr Cook said future aggressors would be able to act with impunity if the objectives of the UN weren't met.
sentence.Network_cn: 库克先生说如果联合国的目标无法达成，那么将来的侵略者就可能会逃脱惩罚。

sentence.Network_en: These gangs operate with apparent impunity.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些团伙明目张胆地活动，却不受任何惩罚。

sentence.Network_en: A ten - thousand - year fit of bad temper, the island ignores with impunity.
sentence.Network_cn: 小岛在这种暴戾中安然无恙, 它习惯了,完全不加以理睬.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语专业考研核心词汇 - 豆丁网 ... imprudent 轻率的, 鲁莽的 impunity 不受惩罚, 免罚, 无患 inane 空洞的.
经济预测，欲望永不眠 - FT速读测试 - FT中文网 ... psephology 选举学 impunity 不受惩罚，免责 dissenter 持异见者.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... punish v 惩罚 impunity n 不受刑罚，免罚 pendant n 下垂物.
prior to的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... cocaine 可卡因, 古柯碱 ... impunity 不受惩罚, 无事, 无患.

list.abs: The verdict seemed to be impunity ., 看来裁决可能是免于惩处.
with ease 熟练地轻而易举地218. with impunity 不受惩罚地219. with passage of.
probing into impunity reasons for damage compensation of environmental pollution ., 环境污染损害赔偿的免责事由探讨.
That means that drug gangs can kidnap almost impunity ., 那意味着毒犯在绑架后可以几乎不受惩罚.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin impunitas, from impunis 'unpunished', from in- 'not' + poena 'penalty' or punire 'punish'

entry.def: If you say that someone does something with impunity, you disapprove of the fact that they are not punished for doing something bad.

example.ex: Mr Cook said future aggressors would be able to act with impunity if the objectives of the UN weren't met...
example.tran: 库克先生说如果联合国的目标无法达成,那么将来的侵略者就可能会逃脱惩罚。

example.ex: These gangs operate with apparent impunity.
example.tran: 这些团伙明目张胆地活动,却不受任何惩罚。
